content

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • content.Element
      • content.Table

  • public class Table
extends Element
    A table is an element that contains cells, organized in rows. It is similar to an HTML table in its structure, but contains enriched functions.
    Author:
    Bruno Quercia

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Table()
      Creates a new table with dimensions (0, 0).
      Table(int nbRows, int nbCols)
      Creates a new table with a given number of rows and columns.
